title: HOW DO I PLEY RANK ON LEAGUE OF LEGENDS.
body: MY FRiends have a gold  medal on there status the gold division and they're telling me that i haves too play 2 normal games and 3 tewistedtreelines

replies.body:
Ok so two things:
1. You need to be level 30 (Why level 30 because its max level).
2. You need 16 champions or more. (Why 16+ because in ranked game you ban 6 champions and 9 different champions are picked so very low chance but possible that your 15 or less champions are picked.).
It wont let me play ranked
